carpooling_package

Interface Passengers

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    freqPassenger, guest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    freqPassengerImpl, guestImpl, PassengersImpl

    public interface Passengers
    An interface of the Functionalities that the passengers can do.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String report()
      Report Complain or Review by the passenger on the trip.
      boolean reserveTicket(Car c, Passenger p)
      Reserves a ticket within the Car chosen.
      int searchRoutes(Car[] c)
      Allows user to search different routes.

    • Method Detail

      • searchRoutes

        int searchRoutes(Car[] c)
        Allows user to search different routes.
        Parameters:
        c - An array of the cars to choose the route.
        Returns:
        Route number of the desired route.

      • reserveTicket

        boolean reserveTicket(Car c,
                      Passenger p)
        Reserves a ticket within the Car chosen.
        Parameters:
        c - the car of the route chosen.
        p - the passenger who reserved this ticket.
        Returns:
        boolean true if ticket successfully reserved while false if not.

      • report

        java.lang.String report()
        Report Complain or Review by the passenger on the trip.
        Returns:
        a String of the report written.
